metadata.title: CVE-2024-45002 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:rtla/osnoise: Prevent NULL dereference in error handlingIf the "tool->data" allocation fails then there is no need to callosnoise_free_top() and, in fact, doing so will lead to a NULL dereference.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
